title: New Honor System
body: So, with the new honor system, how do you level up your honor? Do you just get more honors from your games or you honoring people, and how much would it take to get through the levels?

replies.body: Currently there's no way of measuring your level progress in honor, but you should slowly increase your level just by playing. A quiet but steadfast player still raises there level per game without votes. That said, getting a lot of votes for your exceptional behavior is the best way of leveling up fast! When it does, you'll see your Honor emblem bloom, and getting 1 or 2 Honor votes from your team in a game will put a flair atop your loading banner too. You don't get honor for voting others though.
Of course! Glad I could clarify things for ya. :)
